title: varuvAr varuvAr enru vegu kAlamAghavE
sahitya:
varuvAr varuvAr enru vegu kAlamAghavE virumbiyE kAttirundEn


anupallavi

  pAda padmangaL padinda iDangaLellAm parishuddhamAghumE bhava vinai tIrumE


caraNam 1    ettanai kAlamAi cittam kalangiyE pittanaip-pOlirundEn 
uttamarE ummai urugit-tudittavarin attanai pApangaLum appOdE pOghumE
    caraNam 2    dAnamum ariyEnE dharmamum ariyEnE bhaktiyum ariyEnE pAmaranAi irundEnE 
endanmEl krpai sheidu endan grhattil vandu endan kuraigaL tIrtta engaL sadgurunAthA
    caraNam 3    kAdonru kETkavE kaNNonru pArkkavE vAyonru shollavE manamonru ninaikkavE 
endan pUjaigaLellAm evvAru Etruk-koNDu enmEl krpai vaittu enakkuruL purivAyO
